key.name: theme-preference
key.description: Whether to use light theme, dark theme or follow system theme. (0 - follow system theme, 1 - light, 2 - dark)

key.name: autorefresh-delay
key.description: Amount of time (in seconds) between automatic widget refreshing. Set to 0 to disable autorefresh. (Default: 900 seconds - 15 minutes)

key.name: favorite-apps
key.description: List of favorite apps for the app chooser, stored as paths to their .desktop files.

key.name: time-format
key.description: Time format string for the clock, using the format described in the documentation at https://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html#time.strftime.

key.name: date-format
key.description: Date format string for the clock, using the format described in the documentation at https://docs.python.org/3/library/time.html#time.strftime.
